titles.title: Mobile Mammography Promotion Act of 2011
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow refunds of Federal motor fuel excise taxes on fuels used in mobile mammography vehicles.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/11/2011--Introduced. Mobile Mammography Promotion Act of 2011- Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from the motor fuel excise tax fuel used in any highway vehicle designed exclusively to provide mobile mammography services.
